response.original_title: Chacun son cinema ou Ce petit coup au coeur quand la lumiere s'eteint et que le film commence
response.overview: Commissioned to mark the 60th anniversary of the Cannes Film Festival, "To Each His Own Cinema" brought together 33 of the world's pre-eminent filmmakers to produce short pieces exploring the multifarious facets of cinema and their perspective on the state of their chosen artform in the early 21st century.
response.tagline: A declaration of love on the big screen
response.title: To Each His Own Cinema
